transcript:
yeah so if you can understand this
though this will absolutely change your
life the way I want you to think of your
mind right is like a garden if you have
a garden you can't go to your garden and
plant strawberry seeds and just expect
that tomatoes are going to grow from
strawberry seeds right well the same is
true for your mind you cannot be
negative talk down to yourself and
surround yourself with a whole bunch of
negative people and just expect that
you're magically going to have this
positive life because just as the garden
your input is going to always equal your
output so if you want a positive life if
you want a better life you have to
change the way that you speak to
yourself before anything else you have
to change your input so that your output
changes if you change your thoughts in
your head then you surround yourself
with the right people then you realize
that people aren't just born positive
they have to work at it daily it's a
practice that you have to put into your
life and so if you want to build an
amazing life you just have to pay
attention to what you say to yourself
and realize that it all starts in your
mind
